title: "‘Rent-A-Robot’ Is A Game Changer For Manufacturing"
excerpt: "For years, cobots have been shown to make manufacturing processes faster and more efficient, but research shows that fewer than 10% of manufacturers use them. The “rent-a-robot” model—which is gaining steam across the country—can change that."
